author: Maddie Bender, Jordan Pearson
title: America's Supercomputers Are Now Helping Scientists Fight Coronavirus
description: From America's national nuclear labs to NASA, the nation's most powerful computers are pitching in to fight coronavirus with a mind-boggling amount of power.
content: The White House announced the creation of a supercomputing consortium on Monday that will pool resources to aid in researching and modeling Covid-19. Fourteen different organizations, both federal and private, will give teams of scientists free access to time… [+3487 chars]
